definition: the range of interest or activity that can be anticipated
details:
noun
- the range of interest or activity that can be anticipated
= example: the range of interest or activity that can be anticipated
= synonyms: view
- the line at which the sky and Earth appear to meet
= synonyms: apparent horizon, sensible horizon, skyline
- the great circle on the celestial sphere whose plane passes through the sensible horizon and the center of the Earth
= synonyms: celestial horizon
- a specific layer or stratum of soil or subsoil in a vertical cross section of land
